properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Tipton, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 8:02PM CST until January 27 at 3:36AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for most of the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Osceola
* until Sunday January 26.
* At 7 PM Monday the stage was 28.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 34.0 feet on Monday January 20.
* Flood stage is 28.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Sunday January 12 and will
continue rising to near 34.0 feet by Monday January 20. The river
will fall below flood stage Sunday January 26.
* At 34.0 feet...In Tennessee, Highway 19 is flooding at Johnson
Lake. Houses and farmsteads just west of the north end of T.
Rossinger Road are beginning to flood. Oscar Griggs Road, Conner
Road, and Long Hole Road are beginning to flood. Western sections
of Grammer Road are beginning to flood, making evacuation from
homesteads difficult.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
